languages.text: Последняя воля погибшего капитана должна была быть исполнена. Импровизированные похороны начались с короткого воинского салюта, и Вольный Торговец лично проч{mf|ел|ла} молебен за души погибших на "Рожденном в огне". Ибо всякий честный слуга Императора, связавший жизнь с путешествиями через тьму, чтит своих собратьев и скорбит об их гибели.

The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.
languages.original_text: Последняя воля погибшего капитана должна была быть исполнена. Импровизированные похороны начались с короткого воинского салюта, и Вольный Торговец лично проч{mf|ел|ла} молебен за души погибших на "Рожденном в огне". Ибо всякий честный слуга Императора, связавший жизнь с путешествиями через тьму, чтит своих собратьев и скорбит об их гибели.

The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

languages.text: La última petición de la capitana caída se había cumplido. El funeral improvisado empezó con un breve saludo militar, y después {mf|el|la} propi{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente recitó una plegaria por las almas de la Nacida del Fuego, honrando a sus camaradas y lamentando sus muertes como haría cualquier otro siervo del Emperador que dedica su vida a atravesar la oscuridad.
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

traits.locale_text: La última petición de la capitana caída se había cumplido. El funeral improvisado empezó con un breve saludo militar, y después {mf|el|la} propi{mf|o|a} Comerciante Independiente recitó una plegaria por las almas de la Nacida del Fuego, honrando a sus camaradas y lamentando sus muertes como haría cualquier otro siervo del Emperador que dedica su vida a atravesar la oscuridad.

languages.text: 行商浪人满足了那位不幸罹难舰长的遗愿。士兵们敬了简短的军礼，举行了一场即兴的葬礼。行商浪人亲自为“烈焰之子”号的船员们颂唱了祷文。帝皇每位在黑暗中穿梭的忠实仆人，都会向他们的同袍致以敬意，哀悼他们的死亡。
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人满足了那位不幸罹难舰长的遗愿。士兵们敬了简短的军礼，举行了一场即兴的葬礼。行商浪人亲自为“烈焰之子”号的船员们颂唱了祷文。帝皇每位在黑暗中穿梭的忠实仆人，都会向他们的同袍致以敬意，哀悼他们的死亡。

languages.text: 死んだ船長の最後の願いは果たされた。即席の葬儀は短い軍式敬礼で始まり、自由開拓者はファイアボーンの魂を想って祈りを唱えた。暗闇の中を航海することに人生を捧げた皇帝の誠実な従者が仲間を讃え、その死を悼むのと同じように。
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

traits.locale_text: 死んだ船長の最後の願いは果たされた。即席の葬儀は短い軍式敬礼で始まり、自由開拓者はファイアボーンの魂を想って祈りを唱えた。暗闇の中を航海することに人生を捧げた皇帝の誠実な従者が仲間を讃え、その死を悼むのと同じように。

languages.text: Die letzte Bitte des gefallenen Captains wurde erfüllt. Die improvisierte Bestattung begann mit einem kurzen militärischen Salut, und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst sprach ein Gebet für die Seelen der Fireborn. Genau wie jeder ehrenhafte Diener des Imperators, der sein Leben der Reise durch die Dunkelheit gewidmet hat, die Seinen ehrt und ihren Tod betrauert.
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

Die improvisierte Bestattung begann mit einem kurzen militärischen Salut, und {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} selbst sprach ein Gebet für die Seelen der Fireborn. Genau wie jeder ehrenhafte Diener des Imperators, der sein Leben der Reise durch die Dunkelheit gewidmet hat, die Seinen ehrt und ihren Tod betrauert.

languages.text: Des funérailles improvisées furent organisées pour exaucer l'ultime souhait de la capitaine. Après un bref salut militaire, {mf|le libre-marchand lui-même|la libre-marchande elle-même} récita une prière pour les âmes du Flamboyant, afin de rendre hommage à ses congénères et faire leur deuil, comme tout honnête serviteur de l'Empereur qui a consacré sa vie à voyager dans les ténèbres.
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

languages.text: Ölümü kucaklayan kaptanın son dileği yerine getirildi. Doğaçlama cenaze, kısa bir askerî selamlama ile başladı. Hür Tacir, Ateşten'de yiten ruhlar için bizzat kendisi dua etti. Bu dua, karanlığa yapılan yolculukta hayatını yitiren yoldaşlarının yasını tutan, İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârının duasıydı.
languages.original_text: The last request of the fallen captain had been fulfilled. The improvised funeral began with a brief military salute, and the Rogue Trader {mf|himself|herself} recited a prayer for the souls of the Fireborn. Just as any honest servant of the Emperor who has dedicated their life to voyaging through the darkness would honour their fellows and mourn their deaths.

traits.locale_text: Düşen kaptanın son dileği yerine getirildi. Doğaçlama cenaze, kısa bir askerî selamlama ile başladı ve Hür Tacir, Ateşten'de yiten ruhlar için bizzat kendisi dua etti. Bu dua, karanlığa yapılan yolculukta hayatını yitiren yoldaşlarının yasını tutan, İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârının duasıydı.
